titles.title: Youth Development Block Grant Act of 1993
A bill to establish a youth development grant program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S16754-16755)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Introduced. Youth Development Block Grant Act of 1993 - Establishes a youth development block grant program. Authorizes appropriations. Sets forth formulas for allocation of funds to States and for distribution of funds through State commissions to local boards for community-based youth development services. Requires establishment of county or multicounty Local Youth Development Boards to receive such assistance. Requires establishment of a State Youth Development Commission in each State desiring to receive such assistance. Establishes a National Youth Development Commission to advise the Assistant Secretary for Children and Families of the Department of Health and Human Services on implementation of this Act.
